Html:
I postponed release candidate 1 and added beta 4. There was a reported bug (issue 2326 “Problem with resizing on NavigationPane”) that required a fundamental change in NavigationPane. We have this bug fixed but we need some more testing before it is released. I rather know it is right than to meet a self imposed deadline.

Beta 4 is scheduled for release on 8/27/2006 but depending on how the week goes it may be sooner.

Sorry for the delay.

Thanks,
Scorn
